metadata.dc:author: Aramendi, J I
Ortiz de Salazar, A
Juanena, C
Agosti, J
Oñate, A
Alcíbar, J
metadata.dc:description: A 50 year old male with isolated left main coronary artery disease was surgically treated with saphenous vein patch angioplasty. Surgery results are reviewed by coronariography 2 months later and we comment its use as alternative technique in selected cases.
metadata.dc:title: Angioplastia con parche en estenosis aislada del tronco de la arteria coronaria izquierda.
[Patch angioplasty in isolated left main coronary artery stenosis].
